originalText.text: Great service. Very professional. No problems or surprises. Recommended.

text.text: Great service. Very professional. No problems or surprises. Recommended.

originalText.text: I needed a location for my Daughter to get to 34th street water taxi and for my wife to shop and "see". For me, a location to cycle from and easily revisit throughout the day. Employees were respectful and always helped out when needed . I will use this garage again.

text.text: I needed a location for my Daughter to get to 34th street water taxi and for my wife to shop and "see". For me, a location to cycle from and easily revisit throughout the day. Employees were respectful and always helped out when needed . I will use this garage again.

originalText.text:
Parked at this ICON managed location for 2 nights.
Attendants were very helpful, friendly, patient, and efficient while my family got our stuff out. Neighborhood is NYC busy so nothing that can be done about that.
I had pre-paid for parking so retrieving my reservation was easy.
Couple of concerns.
I shopped around at various ICON locations in the neighborhood and this was cheapest for that day and time.
1. ICON's website is very slow and unreliable. I suggest using the app which was much faster.
2. My first attempt at reservation failed because the bank rejected the charge. Matter was quickly resolved with the bank requesting automated text authorization but i was wary of getting double charged on my second attempt. Keeping an eye on my account for the next few days for just that.
3. The ticket preprinted with saying vehicle damaged which was not accurate. I walked the attendant around it to show him there was no damage and he claimed the system always generates that. I found that explanation unsatisfactory. I suggest walking the attendant around the car and canceling the damaged vehicle note and take pictures.

originalText.text: Use parking panda beforehand to preregister for a better deal than what they offer for a Saturday night.

text.text: Use parking panda beforehand to preregister for a better deal than what they offer for a Saturday night.

originalText.text: Rip off! Paid for 24 hours of parking and they charged us more than double for leaving early!

text.text: Rip off! Paid for 24 hours of parking and they charged us more than double for leaving early!
